Solution Overview

In Sales Commission, a participant is a role given to the sales representative. The Participants are tagged with Positions and they participate in variable compensation program. Each Participant can have more than one Position.

Each Position is unique. Positions define specific, unique jobs that participants perform in each specific area of the company.

URL: https://commissions.efi.com
Username: Domain Username
Password: Domain Password

Procedures

  • Viewing Dashboard
  • Viewing Messages
  • Viewing Reports
  • Viewing and Accepting Documents
  • Creating New Disputes
  • Setting Accounts

Viewing Dashboard

In dashboard, there are two types of views, one for sales representatives and another for managers. The sales representative will get only one View option while the manager gets two types of View options.

View Name Description
DASH_DG_SDM This view is for Participants.
DASH_DG_RSM_RSD This view is for Participants.
DASH_RSM_RSD_MGR This view is for Manager to view subordinate's dashboard.

The procedure to view the dashboard as a Participant and Manager is given below.

Viewing Dashboard as SDM

  • Click the Dashboard icon.
  • From the Viewing drop-down list, select the dashboard.
    • To view dashboard as a participant:
      • For SDM, select DASH_DG_SDM
      • For RSM or RSD, select DASH_DG_RSM_RSD
    • Then select the Period
  • The dashboard displays your profile and statistical information:
    • Your Profile
    • Payments and Balances
    • Quarterly Attainment
    • Attainment - Annual Quota
    • Cumulative QTD Revenue vs Quarterly Quota
    • Attainment - Quarterly Quota
